queries.top3_employees: SELECT *,salary/12 as monthly_salary FROM employees_df ORDER BY monthly_salary DESC LIMIT 3
queries.avg_sal_dept: SELECT department,AVG(salary) from employees_df GROUP BY department
queries.manager_employees: SELECT m.employee_id AS MNGR_employee_id, m.name as MNGR_name,m.department as MNGR_department ,m.position as MNGR_postion,e.employee_id,e.name,e.department,e.position FROM employees_df e JOIN employees_df m WHERE e.manager_id=m.employee_id ORDER BY m.department ASC
